snippet: Taylor 2, the second troupe of the Paul Taylor Dance Company, performed some of the classic Taylor works at Pace University.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews performance by Taylor 2, the pared down version of the Paul Taylor Dance Company, at Pace University Schimmel Center for the Arts.
lead_paragraph: Taylor 2, the second troupe of the Paul Taylor Dance Company, performed some of the classic Taylor works at Pace University.

headline.seo: Taylor 2 Gives a Paul Taylor Sampler at Pace - Review
headline.main: Spotlighting a Choreographer Through Some Classic Works
headline.print_headline: Spotlighting a Choreographer Through Some Classic Works
